categories.name: Getting Started
categories.description: Learn the basics of using Youtilify

articles.title: How to Create Your First Trip
articles.description: Step-by-step guide to planning your first trip with Youtilify

content.text: Creating your first trip with Youtilify is simple and intuitive. This guide will walk you through every step of the process, from setting up your preferences to generating your personalized itinerary.
Start by telling us where you want to go. You can search for cities, countries, or even specific attractions. Our AI will understand your preferences and suggest the best options.
Pro tip: Be specific about your destination. Instead of just 'Europe', try 'Paris, France' or 'Italian Coastline' for better recommendations.
Select your preferred travel dates and duration. Our system will consider seasonal factors, local events, and weather patterns to optimize your itinerary.

articles.title: Understanding AI Recommendations
articles.description: Learn how our AI creates personalized travel suggestions

content.text: Our AI recommendation engine analyzes millions of data points to create the perfect itinerary for your unique travel style. Here's how it works.
The more information you provide about your preferences, the better our AI can tailor recommendations to your specific needs.

articles.title: Troubleshooting Login Issues
articles.description: Common login problems and their solutions

content.text: Having trouble logging into your Youtilify account? This guide covers the most common login issues and their solutions.
If you continue to experience issues after following these steps, please contact our support team.

articles.title: Collaborative Trip Planning
articles.description: How to plan trips with friends and family

content.text: Planning a trip with multiple people can be challenging. Our collaborative features make it easy to coordinate with your travel companions.

articles.title: Expense Tracking Guide
articles.description: Master your travel budget with smart expense tracking

content.text: Keep track of your travel expenses effortlessly with our intelligent expense tracking features.
